text: "Teardrops on My Guitar" is the second single off of American singer Taylor Swift's first self-titled studio album. The song was released on February 20, 2007. The song was able to make it to #2 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs and #13 on the Billboard Hot 100. It was also certified 3Ã— Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). Swift said that she was inspired by Drew Hardwick, her classmate whom she had a crush on. Unknown to Hardwick, he would talk to Swift about another girl who he had a crush on. She never confessed her feelings to him. Actor Tyler Hilton plays the main male character Drew in the music video. ==Music video== It premiered on CMT on February 15, 2007. The video debuted at number 19 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of March 15, 2007.
